directory.description: Home page.

folder.name: ODTFiles
folder.description: ODT files of the Tanach books.

folder.description: PDF files of the Tanach books.

file.name: favicon.ico
file.description: Tanach icon.

file.name: index.html
file.description: Default site entry re-directs immediately to Tanach.xml.

file.name: License.html
file.description: Creative Commons license document.

file.name: robots.txt
file.description: Internet robots control file.

file.name: Tanach.xml
file.description: Primary site entry.

file.name: Tanach.zip
file.description: Zipped site contents.

file.name: WLCReleaseNotes.html
file.description: Groves Center release notes for the current WLC version.

file.name: WLCManual.pdf
file.description: Current Groves Center manual for the WLC.

directory.name: Books
directory.description: Books of the Tanach, including 5 Documentary-Hypothesis-marked Torah books, and the TanachHeader.xml, TanachIndex.xml files.

file.name: TanachHeader.xml
file.description: Tanach overall TEI header, notes and coding sections; no Books.

file.name: TanachIndex.xml
file.description: Short index to Tanach chapters and verses for citation testing.

directory.name: cgi-bin
directory.description: Unused, un-deletable, and empty web hosting folder.

directory.name: DH
directory.description: Documentary hypothesis files including multibook Torah files.

file.name: DHSpecification.Deuteronomy.xml
file.description: Documentary Hypothesis marking specification for Deuteronomy.

file.name: DHSpecification.Exodus.xml
file.description: Documentary Hypothesis marking specification for Exodus.

file.name: DHSpecification.Genesis.xml
file.description: Documentary Hypothesis marking specification for Genesis.

file.name: DHSpecification.Leviticus.xml
file.description: Documentary Hypothesis marking specification for Leviticus.

file.name: DHSpecification.Numbers.xml
file.description: Documentary Hypothesis marking specification for Numbers.

directory.name: Fonts
directory.description: Font files and HTML-only font test file.

file.name: SBL_Hbrw.ttf
file.description: Society of Biblical Literature (SBL) SBL Hebrew TrueType font.

file.name: SBL_Hebrew_readme.txt
file.description: Readme file for the SBL Hebrew font.

directory.name: Images
directory.description: Image files.

file.name: Background
file.description: Tiled background for site displays.

file.name: CreativeCommons.gif
file.description: Creative Commons logo.

file.name: Job7.11.jpg
file.description: JPG image of correctly rendered Job 7:11.

file.name: Ps27.13.jpg
file.description: JPG image of correctly rendered Psalms 27:13.

file.name: TanachIcon.ico
file.description: Site Tanach icon.

file.name: Transcriber.png
file.description: Transcriber address.

directory.name: Java
directory.description: Java archive (.jar) files of sources and classes for the software that generated the site. The site is constructed by calling the applications in the order: WLC2XML, DHMarker, Splitter, Supplements.

file.name: DHMarker.jar
file.description: Application to apply Documentary Hypothesis markings to Torah book files.

file.name: HTMLServer.jar
file.description: Application serving HTML Tanach texts from the server.

file.name: MC2U.jar
file.description: Application converting MC coded text to Unicode/XML in Supplements directory.

file.name: ODTServer.jar
file.description: Application serving ODT Tanach texts from the server.

file.name: Supplements.jar
file.description: Application that generates the supplements files.

file.name: TextServer.jar
file.description: Application serving text Tanach texts from the server.

file.name: WLC2XML.jar
file.description: Application converting of Michigan-Claremont formated text to Unicode and XML.

file.name: XMLServer.jar
file.description: Application serving XML Tanach texts from the server. For internal use only.

directory.name: Javascript
directory.description: Javascript programs for site operation.

file.name: LCFacsimile.js
file.description: Javascript code to display LC facsimile pages.

file.name: SarissaLib.js
file.description: Javascript code library for the Sarissa browser compatibility software.

file.name: TanachHome.js
file.description: Javascript code the Home page.

file.name: TanachBook.js
file.description: Javascript code the Book page.

file.name: UtilityLib.js
file.description: General purpose Javascript utilities.

directory.name: ODTFiles
directory.description: Books of the Tanach in PDF format.

folder.name: static
folder.description: Fixed files in an ODT file bundle.

file.description: Zipped archive of Tanach books with accents in ODT format.

file.description: Zipped archive of Tanach books with consonants in ODT format.

file.name: Tanach.mor.odt.zip
file.description: Zipped archive of Tanach books with morphology in ODT format.

directory.name: PreviousVersions
directory.description: Recent previous versions of the site. Empty in Tanach.zip file.

directory.description: Supplemental information about the Tanach.

file.description: Statistics and book-by-book display of qere / ketib variants in the WLC.

file.name: Verses.xml
file.description: Statistics of verses and name verse finder in Supplements directory.

file.description: Zipped archive of Tanach books with accents in UTF-8 text format.

directory.name: WEB-INF
directory.description: Server software. Empty in the Tanach.zip archive.

directory.name: XSL
directory.description: XSL transfomation files for the site. Also contains supporting secondary XML files. Some included files are for the server only and are not needed for client viewing.

file.name: 404.shtml
file.description: Server response for type 404, "File not found" errors.

file.name: 500.shtml
file.description: Server response for type 500, "Internal server" errors.

file.name: 503.shtml
file.description: Server response for type 503, "Server overload" errors.

file.name: Coding.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for Coding.xml page.

file.name: Contents.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for Contents.xml page.

file.name: DH.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for Documentary Hypothesis marking specification files in the DH directory.

file.name: FontTest.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for the FontTest.xml page.

file.name: LCIndex.xml
file.description: Folio index to the LC facsimiles (actually in HTML format).

file.name: Links.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for links to external sites pages.

file.name: Links.xml
file.description: XML definition of markers for external link specifications.

file.name: ServerError.xml
file.description: XML stub for launching error reporting for any of the servers.

file.name: ServerError.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation for writing error responses for any of the servers.

file.name: Tanach.def.xml
file.description: XML SiteChecker definition of site contents.

file.name: Tanach.xsd
file.description: XSD format definition for Tanach XML files.

file.name: Tanach.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for the multibook files in the DH directory.

file.name: TEIHeader.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for the TEIHeader.xml page file.

file.name: Text.xsl.xml
file.description: Key XSL transformation file to display Hebrew text from Tanach XML markup.

file.name: UnicodeRep.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file for UnicodeRep.xml.

file.name: XML2XHTML.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file conversion of XML files to XHTML for the Server server.

file.name: XML2ODT.content.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file conversion of XML files to ODT content.xml files for the ODTServer server.

file.name: XML2ODT.styles.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file conversion of XML files to ODT styles.xml files for the ODTServer server.

file.name: XML2Text.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file conversion of XML files to text files for the TextServer server.

file.name: XML2XML.xsl.xml
file.description: XSL transformation file used by XMLServer to extract citations from XML book files.
